games.title: In this game, your goal is to clear the field by removing pairs of numbers.

steps.text: You can remove pairs of numbers if:

substeps.prefix: The sum of the numbers is

substeps.suffix: with no other numbers in between.
with no other numbers in between.

actions.title: HINT Button:
actions.description: If you cannot find any more pairs to remove, you can use the
actions.suffix: button to highlight available pairs of numbers on the field.

actions.title: FILL Button:
actions.description: If you cannot find any more pairs to remove, you can use the
actions.suffix: button to add new numbers to the field.

actions.title: RESTART GAME Button:
actions.description: If you want to start over, you can press the
actions.suffix: button to reset the game, clearing the field and restarting from the beginning.

games.title: In this game, your goal is to identify the correct animal name.

steps.text: You need to complete the following:

substeps.prefix: Four cards are generated with the same image but different random animal names.
You need to click on the card with the correct name to earn

substeps.suffix: If you click incorrectly three times, the game will restart with your score returning to 0.

substeps.prefix: If you guess correctly, you earn
substeps.suffix: and four new cards are generated with a new animal.

actions.title: Game Over:
actions.description: If you guess incorrectly three times, the game will restart and your score will reset.
